Start with the positives: the attention to detail\, the graphics and the environments are fantastic. It had so much promise\, but this is overshadowed by a cliched story of revenge.  I’ll leave the spoilers to others.  But in general terms\, the plot is contrived\, the beloved characters do not act In a way consistent with the first game\, and the new characters are unlikeable despite the game’s best efforts to make you empathise with them (one in particular).  The story does have some good moments (most in the first couple of hours)\, but after that it becomes clichéd with a mixed bag of dialog.  The game desperately wants to preach the message ‘revenge is bad’ but it does so by forcing characters (and often the player) to do inexplicably bad things\, then scolds you for what the game has either done or forced you to do.  With very little choice for the player\, why should I take ownership of the message? Just cheap\, clumsy writing.  In summary\, the technical achievements of this game are wasted on what just seems like brutality porn with a poor story that has neither respect for It’s predecessor nor its characters.  Shocking for the sake of being shocking and ultimately very disappointing for something I’ve waited seven years for.… Expand
